member.summary: The end of packet (EOP) waited for.

member.summary: The number of reply data bytes to be read.
member.remarks: Count can be between 0 and n bytes.

member.summary: Maximum time, in milliseconds, to wait for reply data. WaitTime -1 (Default value) indicates infinite wait time.

member.summary: If True, all the reply data is moved to ReplyData.

Sends data asynchronously.
No reply from the receiver, whether or not the operation was successful, is expected.

Media depend information of the receiver (optional).
